article.sect1:
This is an experiment.Let's see if it works.
So I am trying to re-familiarise myself with DocBook. Oxgen is cheating a bit, as I don't need to add the tags manually. This is some nonsense text, because I don't want to publically share anything I actually write for the company.
So: projects so far, which I might put in here if and only if I can work out how to limit them to a SUSE audience...

listitem.para: An overall comparison of the process of installing a PC and connecting it to the systems of RH and SUSE.

article.sect1: DisclaimerThis is entirely unofficial and does not in any way represent the views of my employer.
